body: There really needs to be a tag that's basically "karma for a rapist." Where a rapist in the story gets their comeuppance like in this. Maybe just make it the "Karma." tag. When paired with the "rape" tag it would let us know that either the rapist got punished or someone was deservedly punished with rape. Either way it would help a LOT with finding the real good stuff besides the cliche "rape women till they break."
